Data for the [Bechdel test](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bechdel_test) is available via an web-accessible API by putting this URL in your browser:

* https://bechdeltest.com/api/v1/getAllMovies

The output is in [JSON file format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSON).

Save the output (e.g., right-click or copy and paste the text) to a text file with the `.json` file extension, e.g., `test.json`.

To convert JSON to a table format in R:

* https://stackoverflow.com/questions/20925492/how-to-import-json-into-r-and-convert-it-to-table

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
df <- fromJSON('getAllMovies.json')
head(df)
```
